name: Zombie Shooting: 3D Simulation
description:
Zombie Shooter is first person shooter of 3D graphics combined with blood boiling zombie survival action game. player is driven by one goal: stay alive as long as you can!.
Zombie Shooter is all about survival of mankind and killing the dead who have escaped the quarantine zone.
The Goal is Simple Shot Down the Enemy as fast as you can. Shot the Zombies against the time.
GamePlay Features
1.Shooting Zombies on the Run.
2. Shoot the Zombies While they Attacked you
3.Check your Health and Enjoy the Unlimited Fun at your tabs and Mobiles.
Check your Enemies at the Road sides and health indication to save your self.
weapon-up with shotgun, sniper, M1911, AK47, MP5 and even use pistol to Kill those bloody zombies.
zombies raid and survival is problem.
survive as long as you can
Remain silent and Kill the zombies with zombie Shooter 3D.
Enjoy Killing the Zombies with new Action.
